resp = client.indices.create(
    index="circles",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "circle": {
                "type": "geo_shape"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.ingest.put_pipeline(
    id="polygonize_circles",
    description="translate circle to polygon",
    processors=[
        {
            "circle": {
                "field": "circle",
                "error_distance": 28,
                "shape_type": "geo_shape"
            }
        }
    ],
)
print(resp1)
